> Understand which tables and variables are relevant 

To reproduce the **demo** cohort, can use the `subject_id` from [MIMIC-IV Clinical Database Demo](https://physionet.org/content/mimic-iv-demo/2.2/#files-panel).

Note the following tables are from `mimiciv_3_1_hosp`.

|Index |Table | Relevant Columns| Maybe|
|:-:|:--:|:----:|:-:| 
|1 | [admissions](https://mimic.mit.edu/docs/iv/modules/hosp/admissions/) | subject_id, <br/> admittime, <br/> dischtime, deathtime, <br/> admission_type| hadm_id | 
|2 | [patients](https://mimic.mit.edu/docs/iv/modules/hosp/patients/)| subject_id, <br/> gender | |
